entry.title: Thursday: Near blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 50 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending this evening then clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
